dialog.message: Farrand, we are about half way to Zeselia,
we should make it there within the next week.
Good, Waldomar said this meeting will be peaceful but keep your wits about you,
I fear he may have bad intentions.
Really?
Yes, his father was from the old world where man was left unchecked
and humanity ravaged the world environmentally to the point of no return.
Isthmo is one of the only habitable areas left on earth that still has
valuable resources. I wouldn’t be surprised if he tries to take it all for himself.
With an all out war?
Do they really think they can stand up to us with our advanced magic and the spore thing?.
We can’t be sure. They too have made progress with their weaponry since
the last great war ended 20 years ago. Granted, they still use gunpowder.
Interesting...
But the fact remains that Waldomar II has been encroaching on our land
for the past 2 years now and believes we haven’t noticed.
Our scouts have also reported his troops mobilizing along our borders.
In that case I fear the worst may come of this meeting.
Are you sure its a good idea?
The chance to avoid a second war, however slim it may be, is worth the risk.
Good point.
There’s a stream up ahead. We can set up camp for the night there.
This is ridiculous.
What?
The whole "no mounts" thing. This trip took us, like, three days.
I don't think my feet even exist anymore.
Well, what do you want me to do about it? The rules are there for a reason.
What reason can you think of for us walking across the entire damn provence?
Tell me, Farrand.
Well,
for one, horses eat things they're not supposed to. They're invasive.
Then we can bring some feed or something. You're a higher up now, why don't you bring the issue to a meeting?
Oh, so then I can be "Farrand: Patron of Sloth" for the rest of my life. Proposing amendments isn't taken lightly, you know.
Well, I guess so. Still...
three days
, man.
You shouldn't be calling me
man
, either. We need to get into the habit of being professional if I want to make good first impressions as a sage.
Yeah, whatever... What matters now is that we got here.
Yes. Now let's try to make this go smoothly. Remember: weapons down, do not act out, and let me do the talking.
Emphasis on "let me do the talking".
Farrand, we have arrived at the Gates of Zeslia.
Good.
You there! State you name and business in the city of Zeslia!
I am Farrand, Sage of Nuado, and this is Jeremiah.
We are here on official business to speak with Waldomar II.
You are permitted to enter.
So... Mighty nice weather we are having today aren't we?
Waldomar has ordered we keep contact to a minimum.
Oh ok then...
Ah, Farrand, the man of the hour! I was starting to get worried you would keep us waiting!
So, did my little crew here give you a warm welcome?
...Please, make yourself comfortable! Want a cigar?
No thank you, I’d like to get Straight to the point.
Well then, by all means! Tell me,
why have we gathered here today?
I have come to order the halt of the Adlers' urban expansion project. As I am sure you are aware,
industrialization poses a threat to both our environment and to our state of social well-being.
You have come to “halt me and my expansion”?
Why, whatever do you mean by that?
You know as well as I do what it means... Your further expansion past the **east west line** is a clear violation of the **candidus treaty** that our fathers agreed upon all those years ago.
Ah, but Farrand it would be selfish to keep all that land to yourself!
What’s selfish is the lavish lifestyle you live
while many of your followers starve!
The state of my own followers is their doing. They are truly free to work and live as they please.
They don’t have imposed reproduction rights or live in blasted huts eating leaves and berries like animals.

The citizens of Isthmo do not live like animals! They are simply free of the corruption and destruction of mans old ways of living. I know your type Waldomar, your thirst for power is unquenchable, you won’t be satisfied until you have completely stripped this land of all of it’s resources in exchange for material wealth!

It’s because of people like you in the **old world** that Isthmo Candidus was created as a safe haven from ecological destruction in the first place and I'll be damned if I even let you have an inch more of it!
AAAHhh
BBRRAAEHHEERG
I will not idly sit by and take these insults! Guards arrest them on charges of treason!
